text.#text:
Federal funds may not be used to pay any expense of the
			 establishment of the commemorative work under this section.

The Peace Corps Commemorative Foundation shall be
			 solely responsible for acceptance of contributions for, and payment of the
			 expenses of, the establishment of the commemorative work under this
			 section.
